labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Brave-Gemini Research" is designed to facilitate AI-powered web searches and academic research, leveraging Brave Search and Google's Gemini model. It offers tools for both general web searches and in-depth analysis of research papers, making it suitable for information retrieval, academic study, and business location queries. The primary focus is on enhancing the efficiency and depth of research activities through AI assistance.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Web Search & Research" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around information retrieval and academic analysis, which are central to its purpose. The secondary label "Database Operations" is included due to the structured retrieval of business/location data in the "brave_local_search" tool. No custom label is necessary, as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Brave-Gemini Research
server_info_crawled.author: @falahgs/brave-gemini-research-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable AI assistants to perform web searches and analyze research papers seamlessly. Leverage the power of Brave Search and Google's Gemini model for enhanced information retrieval and academic analysis.

tools.name: brave_web_search
tools.description: Deploy Server Brave-Gemini Research @falahgs/brave-gemini-research-mcp-server Try in Playground brave_web_search

tools.name: brave_local_search
tools.description: Searches for local businesses and places using Brave's Local Search API. Best for queries related to physical locations, businesses, restaurants, services, etc. Returns detailed information including: - Business names and addresses - Ratings and review counts - Phone numbers and opening hours Use this when the query implies 'near me' or mentions specific locations. Automatically falls back to web search if no local results are found.

tools.name: gemini_research_paper_analysis
tools.description: Performs in-depth analysis of research papers using Google's Gemini-1.5-flash model. Ideal for academic research, literature reviews, and deep understanding of scientific papers. Can extract key findings, provide critical evaluation, summarize complex research, and place papers within the broader research landscape. Best for long-form academic content that requires expert analysis.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@falahgs/brave-gemini-research-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: googleApiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Google API key for Gemini integration
